name: just-the-code
description: Just the code. Strip a project folders from its dependencies (bower/npm) and git (optional) and compress it to pass to a friend.

scripts.build: npm run clean && babel src --out-dir ./dist --source-maps inline
scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.watch: npm run build && chokidar 'src/**/*' 'package.json' '.babelrc' -c 'npm run build' --verbose
